Uses of Package
databaseConnection

Packages that use databaseConnection
Package
Description
consumerProgram
This package contains classes related to the consumer GUI program.
databaseConnection
This package contains classes related to database connections and operations.
shopProgram
This package contains classes related to the shop GUI program.
  • Classes in databaseConnection used by consumerProgram
    Class
    Description
    ConsumerDBConn
    This class provides methods for consumer database operations such as signing up, logging in, querying held cups, and changing account details.
  • Classes in databaseConnection used by databaseConnection
    Class
    Description
    DatabaseUpdate
    This abstract class provides the implementation for common database update operations and defines methods to be implemented for specific actions such as lending and receiving cups.
    DBconnection
    This interface defines the methods required for database connection operations.
    SignupAndLoginExceptions
    This class contains custom exceptions for signup and login operations.
    SignupAndLoginExceptions.AccountNotExistException
    Exception thrown when an account does not exist.
    SignupAndLoginExceptions.IdAlreadyUsedException
    Exception thrown when an ID is already used.
    SignupAndLoginExceptions.IdCantEmptyException
    Exception thrown when the ID is empty.
    SignupAndLoginExceptions.InitialPasswordCantEmptyException
    Exception thrown when the initial password is empty.
    SignupAndLoginExceptions.NameCantEmptyException
    Exception thrown when the Name is empty.
    SignupAndLoginExceptions.NotActivateException
    Exception thrown when the account is not activated.
    SignupAndLoginExceptions.PasswordAlreadyUsedException
    Exception thrown when a password is already used.
    SignupAndLoginExceptions.PasswordCantEmptyException
    Exception thrown when the login password is empty.
    SignupAndLoginExceptions.PasswordWrongException
    Exception thrown when the password is incorrect.
  • Classes in databaseConnection used by shopProgram
    Class
    Description
    ShopDBConn
    This class provides methods for shop database operations such as activating accounts, logging in, changing passwords and names, lending and receiving cups, and querying cup holdings.
